title: [Kung Fu] Iron Bodyguard - Shaw Brothers Celestial Remastered -
description:
Iron Bodyguard
Shaw Brothers Celestial Remastered
DVDrip to Divx Ultra
Embedded English/Chinese subs, require divx ultra compatible software or standalone dvd player, included .srt english subs for those who don&#039;t use divx ultra compatible software or have a standalone player
PLEASE SEED SEED SEED! PLEASE UPLOAD THE FULL DVD of RETURN OF THE ONE ARMED SWORDSMAN if you have it and have it in your heart to hook me up with a movie I need. Thanks to all the nice comments I&#039;ve received, and due to demands I&#039;ve ripped them at 25 fps even though I don&#039;t see what everyone complains about the whole Pal to ntsc thing that celestial did. I&#039;m also the same guy who doesn&#039;t care about the butchered 5.1 soundtracks. The only one I&#039;ve noticed with weirdness with The Chinese Boxer, I couldn&#039;t even be bothered to notice during Clan of the White Lotus. So I guess I&#039;m not too picky, but if the 25fps makes the action that much more smooth then I will give it a try. I was just ripping the movies in the fps that the original dvd was in. I didn&#039;t know it&#039;d be worthwhile to change it to 25fps. THANKS

AKA: The Iron Bodyguard
Director: Chang Cheh  ||  Baau Hok Lai
Choreography: Tong Gaai  ||  Liu Chia Liang
Released: 1973 [Hong Kong]
Genre: Martial Arts
    Sub-Genre: Action/Adventure
Collections:  Celestial Shaw Bros. Series

Plot:	Nowhere were Chang Cheh and Chen Kuan Tai more inventive than when journeying back to the era when the Ching Dynasty fell and the Chinese Republic was born. Witness the patriot who was committed to ending the corruption of the Ching rulers.

Overview:	The collaboration of director Chang Cheh and action star Chen Kuan Tai proved to be one of the most enduring of kung fu&#039;s golden age, and nowhere were the two more inventive than when journeying back to the era when the Ching Dynasty fell and the Chinese Republic was born. Following their landmark successes "Boxer From Shantung" and "Man Of Iron" came this powerful, exciting tale of a patriot committed to ending the corruption of the Ching rulers.

Cast: 	Chen Kuan Tai  ||  Lily Li Li-Li  ||  Danny Lee Sau-Yin  ||  Yueh Hua  ||  Lo Dik  ||  Tung Lam  ||  Kong Do  ||  Fung Hak On  ||  Dean Shek Tin  ||  Chiang Nan  ||  Booi Dai  ||  Li Min Lang  ||  Hsu Hsia  ||  Hoh Gong  ||  Wu Chih Ching  ||  Wong Kwong Yue  ||  Wong Ching Ho  ||  Shum Lo  ||  Cheung Ging Boh  ||  Liu Wai
(Click any actor to search for more of their movies!)

Running Time:	94 mins. (approx.)

Languages:	Mandarin

Subtitles:	ENGLISH, Chinese (Traditional), Bahasa (Malaysian), Bahasa (Indonesian)

Distributor:	Intercontinental Video Limited (IVL)  [A Hong Kong-Based Distributor]

Rating:	
UN - "Unrated. This film has not been rated by the review board."
